pkgmetadata.longdescription: Weighted and Lexicographic Goal Programming Interface // Solves goal programming problems of the weighted and lexicographic type, as well as combinations of the two, as described by Ignizio (1983) doi:10.1016/0305-0548(83)90003-5. Allows for a simple human-readable input describing the problem as a series of equations. Relies on the 'lpSolve' package to solve the underlying linear optimisation problem.
